description: [``botocore``] Add ComputeRoleArn to CreateApp, UpdateApp, CreateBranch, and UpdateBranch, allowing caller to specify a role to be assumed by Amplify Hosting for server-side rendered applications.
[``botocore``] Support replicationConfigArn in DMS DescribeApplicableIndividualAssessments API.
[``botocore``] This release introduces APIs to manage DbClusters and adds support for read replicas
[``botocore``] Minor Parser updates to support the new smithy-generated protocol tests. See `boto/botocore#3247 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/3247>`__ for more details.
